attributes.additional_details: Mr shafik rehman was working for BBc and founder of spectrum Radio,he is an introducer of Valentines day In Bangladesh. and founder of democracy watch.
attributes.background: A British citizen who worked for BBC,after his retirement he working for democracy human rights and judicial betterment of Bangladesh.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to press the Bangladeshi Government to release Shafik Rehman.
